errors.not_opted_in:

 Sorry, you need to be opted in to use GSS experiments. Use ?experiments in #bot_spam to get started.

output.footer: This is an automated message based off the users comments. To delete, someone click the "oof"
output.title_server: GSSP but it's been processed by a robot

status.checking: Checking to see if user table exists
status.not_opted_in: User has not opted into processing. Sorry!

data_collection.opt_in_footer: To proceed, please run this command again.
data_collection.created_record: Created your record as `{}`. Your data is now being processed (don't worry about whether it's done or not - after about 10 minutes we should have enough data for markov chains to work reliably-ish, if you post here a lot)
data_collection.update_record: Your record already exists as `{}` - we're now going to update it. We'll keep you updated on progress
data_collection.complete: Finished building {}'s entry! Data analysis can now be ran. If you wish to update your data record at any time, just simply run this command again!
